definition: hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: Once a vellus hair has changed to a terminal hair, it usually does not change back.
sentences.chinese: 一旦毫毛变成了终毛，通常是不可逆的。

sentences.english: Then a spirit passed before my face; the hair of my flesh stood up
sentences.chinese: 有灵从我面前经过，我身上的毫毛直立。

sentences.english: If you harm a hair of my daughter's head, you'll get yourself into trouble.
sentences.chinese: 你要是动我女儿一根毫毛，你可就自找麻烦了。

sentences.english: Don't you dare do him the slightest harm!
Marston: I won't let anything happen to her, sir.
sentences.chinese: 先生，我不会让她损伤一根毫毛。

sentences.english: But they knew I would not harm a hair on their heads .
sentences.chinese: 但是他们知道我不会动他们一根毫毛。

sentences.english: Shandong faction remains with paint pen to the screen slim, beautiful win.
sentences.chinese: 山东派用毫毛笔作画，以画面纤巧，艳丽取胜。

sentences.english: You shall not put a finger on my daughter.
sentences.chinese: 不许你动我女儿一根毫毛。

sentences.english: If you lay a finger on my girlfriend, I will kill you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你敢碰我的女朋友一根毫毛，我宰了你。

definition: fine hair on the human body
silver needle (fine needle used in acupuncture)
golden cudgel, weapon wielded by Sun Wukong in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
white hair (of animals)/see also 白髮|白发[bai2 fa4]
the staff of a Buddhist monk
to forgive easily/to let off lightly (often with negative: you won't get away with it)
The Nine-Toothed Rake (weapon of Zhu Bajie 豬八戒|猪八戒[Zhu1 Ba1 jie4])
